snippet: More than 50 threats about hidden explosive devices have been made at the University of Pittsburgh since mid-February, and campus security has been tightened as a result.
abstract: Campus security at University of Pittsburgh is tightened because of bomb threats; university spokesman says that there have been more than 50 threats made since mid-February.
lead_paragraph: More than 50 threats about hidden explosive devices have been made at the University of Pittsburgh since mid-February, and campus security has been tightened as a result.

headline.seo: Pitt Is Rattled by Series of Campus Bomb Threats
headline.main: Nerves Are Rattled After Bomb Threats at Pitt
headline.print_headline: Nerves Are Rattled and Campus Security Is Tightened After Bomb Threats at Pitt
